list: Fixed minor bug in the navigation that was causing the page to not render when being run in development mode.
Moved navigation into its own Svelte component.
Changed navigation tiles to be generated from an array instead of manually defining them.
Added a hover effect to the navigation tiles.
Added Auth.js to handle authentication via Credentials.
Added changelog feature (you're reading it right now).
Changed 'Request Data' functionality to try to prevent making multiple requests.
Updated the Client page to display accounts in a table.
Added documentation to the Upload page.
Added an easter egg to the main app page for Chris.
